mapper.select: select * from emp1 order by eno

select a.eno eno,c.dname dname, a.ename ename, a.manager manager, b.ename mname, a.hiredate hiredate, a.salary salary, a.dno dno, a.commission commission from emp1 a, emp1 b, dept c where a.manager=b.eno and a.dno = c.no and a.eno =#{id}
select eno, ename from emp1 where eno in (select distinct manager from emp1) order by eno
select no, dname, loc from dept order by no
select count(*) from privs where password=#{password}
mapper.update: update emp1 set ename=#{ename}, manager=#{manager}, dno=#{dno}, salary=#{salary}, commission=#{commission} where eno=#{eno}
mapper.select: select distinct job from emp1 order by job
mapper.insert: insert into emp1 (eno, ename, job, manager, hiredate, salary, commission, dno) values( #{eno}, #{ename}, #{job}, #{manager}, #{hiredate}, #{salary}, #{commission}, #{dno})
